definition: emptying something accomplished by allowing liquid to run out of it, make weak
details:
noun
- emptying something accomplished by allowing liquid to run out of it
= synonyms: drainage
- a gradual depletion of energy or resources
= example: a gradual depletion of energy or resources
- a pipe through which liquid is carried away
= synonyms: drainpipe, waste pipe
- tube inserted into a body cavity to remove unwanted material, as during surgery
= example: tube inserted into a body cavity to remove unwanted material, as during surgery
verb
- make weak
= example: make weak
= synonyms: enfeeble, debilitate
- empty of liquid
= example: empty of liquid
- deplete of resources
= example: deplete of resources
- flow off gradually
= example: flow off gradually
= synonyms: run out
